+ // Fun√ß√£o para renderizar grade 3D
+ fun DrawScope.render3DGrid(
+     size: Size,
+     camera: Camera3D,
+     distortion: Float,
+     glow: Float
+ ) {
+     val gridSize = 50
+     val cellSize = 100f
+     val centerX = size.width * 0.5f
+     val centerY = size.height * 0.5f
+     
+     for (x in -gridSize..gridSize step 5) {
+         for (z in -gridSize..gridSize step 5) {
+             val point3D = project3DPoint(
+                 x = x * cellSize,
+                 y = -500f + sin(x * 0.1f + z * 0.1f + distortion * PI.toFloat()) * 100f,
+                 z = z * cellSize,
+                 camera = camera,
+                 screenCenter = Offset(centerX, centerY),
+                 fov = camera.fov
+             )
+             
+             if (point3D.z > 0) { // Apenas renderizar pontos na frente da c√¢mera
+                 val alpha = (1f - point3D.z / 2000f).coerceIn(0f, 1f) * glow * 0.5f
+                 val pointSize = (5f / (point3D.z / 500f)).coerceIn(1f, 8f)

-                 brush = Brush.radialGradient(
-                     colors = listOf(
-                         when (index % 6) {
-                             0 -> Color(0xFF6200EE).copy(alpha = alpha)
-                             1 -> Color(0xFF9C27B0).copy(alpha = alpha)
-                             2 -> Color(0xFFBB86FC).copy(alpha = alpha)
-                             3 -> Color(0xFF3700B3).copy(alpha = alpha)
-                             4 -> Color(0xFFE91E63).copy(alpha = alpha)
-                             else -> Color(0xFF00BCD4).copy(alpha = alpha)
-                         },
-                         Color.Transparent
-                     ),
-                     radius = (radius * 2f).coerceAtLeast(1f)
-                 ),
-                 radius = radius,
-                 center = Offset(x, y)
-             )
-         }
-         
-         // Sistema de part√≠culas √©picas - Layer 2 (Part√≠culas m√©dias)
-         repeat(80) { index ->
-             val angle = particleOffset2 + (index * 0.2f)
-             val distance = (index % 12 + 2) * 35f
-             val x = centerX + distance * cos(angle * 1.3f).toFloat()
-             val y = centerY + distance * sin(angle * 0.8f).toFloat()
-             
-             val alpha = (0.15f + 0.3f * sin(angle * 3f).toFloat() * lightIntensity).coerceIn(0f, 0.5f)
-             val radius = (1f + (index % 3) + 2f * sin(angle * 4f).toFloat()).coerceAtLeast(0.5f)
-             
-             drawCircle(
-                 color = when (index % 4) {
-                     0 -> Color(0xFF6200EE).copy(alpha = alpha)
-                     1 -> Color(0xFFBB86FC).copy(alpha = alpha)
-                     2 -> Color(0xFF9C27B0).copy(alpha = alpha)
-                     else -> Color(0xFF00BCD4).copy(alpha = alpha)
-                 },
-                 radius = radius,
-                 center = Offset(x, y)
-             )
-         }
-         
-         // Sistema de part√≠culas √©picas - Layer 3 (Part√≠culas pequenas r√°pidas)
-         repeat(120) { index ->
-             val angle = particleOffset3 + (index * 0.15f)
-             val distance = (index % 15 + 1) * 25f
-             val x = centerX + distance * cos(angle * 1.8f).toFloat()
-             val y = centerY + distance * sin(angle * 1.2f).toFloat()

-             val radius = (0.8f + (index % 2) + 1.5f * sin(angle * 6f).toFloat()).coerceAtLeast(0.3f)
-             
-             drawCircle(
-                 color = when (index % 3) {
-                     0 -> Color(0xFFBB86FC).copy(alpha = alpha)
-                     1 -> Color(0xFF00BCD4).copy(alpha = alpha)
-                     else -> Color(0xFF6200EE).copy(alpha = alpha)
-                 },
-                 radius = radius,
-                 center = Offset(x, y)
-             )
-         }

-             val fogRadius = ((120f + index * 80f) * (0.8f + 0.4f * sin(gradientAnimation * PI.toFloat() + index * 0.8f).toFloat()) * cosmicBreathing).coerceAtLeast(10f)
-             val fogAlpha = (0.03f + 0.05f * sin(gradientAnimation * PI.toFloat() * 2.3f + index * 0.7f).toFloat()) * lightIntensity
-

+                         z = z * cellSize,
+                         camera = camera,
+                         screenCenter = Offset(centerX, centerY),
+                         fov = camera.fov
+                     )
+

+                         x = x * cellSize,
+                         y = -500f + sin(x * 0.1f + (z + 5) * 0.1f + distortion * PI.toFloat()) * 100f,
+                         z = (z + 5) * cellSize,
+                         camera = camera,

+                     )

+                             color = Color(0xFF00BCD4).copy(alpha = alpha * 0.3f),
+                             start = Offset(point3D.x, point3D.y),
+                             end = Offset(nextPointX.x, nextPointX.y),
+                             strokeWidth = 1f
+                         )
+                     }
+                     
+                     if (nextPointZ.z > 0) {
+                         drawLine(
+                             color = Color(0xFF00BCD4).copy(alpha = alpha * 0.3f),
+                             start = Offset(point3D.x, point3D.y),
+                             end = Offset(nextPointZ.x, nextPointZ.y),
+                             strokeWidth = 1f
+                         )
+                     }
+                 }
+             }
+         }
+     }
+ }

+ // Fun√ß√£o para renderizar part√≠culas 3D
+ fun DrawScope.renderParticles3D(
+     particles: List<Particle3D>,
+     camera: Camera3D,
+     screenSize: Size,
+     quantumPulse: Float
+ ) {
+     val centerX = screenSize.width * 0.5f
+     val centerY = screenSize.height * 0.5f
+     
+     particles.sortedByDescending { it.z }.forEach { particle ->
+         val projected = project3DPoint(
+             x = particle.x,
+             y = particle.y,
+             z = particle.z,
+             camera = camera,
+             screenCenter = Offset(centerX, centerY),
+             fov = camera.fov
+         )
+         
+         if (projected.z > 0 && projected.z < 2000f) {
+             val scale = (1000f / projected.z).coerceIn(0.1f, 3f)
+             val alpha = particle.life * (1f - projected.z / 2000f).coerceIn(0f, 1f)
+             val size = particle.size * scale * (1f + sin(particle.pulsePhase + quantumPulse * PI.toFloat()) * 0.3f)
+             
+             when (particle.type) {
+                 ParticleType.STAR -> {
+                     // Estrela brilhante
                      drawCircle(
                          brush = Brush.radialGradient(
                              colors = listOf(
-                         Color(0xFF6200EE).copy(alpha = fogAlpha),
-                         Color(0xFF9C27B0).copy(alpha = fogAlpha * 0.8f),
-                         Color(0xFFBB86FC).copy(alpha = fogAlpha * 0.6f),
+                                 Color.White.copy(alpha = alpha),
+                                 particle.color.copy(alpha = alpha * 0.7f),
+                                 particle.color.copy(alpha = alpha * 0.3f),
                                  Color.Transparent
                              ),
-                     radius = fogRadius,
-                     center = Offset(centerFogX, centerFogY)

-             val endY = startY + 120f * sin(gradientAnimation * PI.toFloat() * 1.7f + index * 0.4f).toFloat()
-             
-             val lineAlpha = (0.15f + 0.3f * sin(gradientAnimation * PI.toFloat() * 2.5f + index).toFloat() * lightIntensity).coerceIn(0f, 0.5f)
-             val strokeWidth = (2f + 3f * sin(gradientAnimation * PI.toFloat() + index * 0.3f).toFloat()).coerceIn(1f, 5f)
-             
+                             radius = size * 2f
+                         ),
+                         radius = size,
+                         center = Offset(projected.x, projected.y)
+                     )
+                     
+                     // Raios de luz
+                     repeat(4) { i ->
+                         val angle = particle.rotation + i * PI.toFloat() / 2f
                          drawLine(
                              brush = Brush.linearGradient(
                                  colors = listOf(
-                         Color(0xFFBB86FC).copy(alpha = lineAlpha),
-                         Color(0xFF00BCD4).copy(alpha = lineAlpha * 0.7f),
+                                     particle.color.copy(alpha = alpha * 0.8f),
                                      Color.Transparent
                                  )
                              ),
-                 start = Offset(startX, startY),
-                 end = Offset(endX, endY),
-                 strokeWidth = strokeWidth,
-                 cap = StrokeCap.Round
-             )
-         }
-         
-         // Raios de luz √©picos
-         repeat(12) { index ->
-             val rayAngle = (index * 30f + gradientAnimation * 50f) * PI.toFloat() / 180f
-             val rayLength = (width * 0.8f) * lightIntensity
-             
-             val startX = centerX + 50f * cos(rayAngle).toFloat()
-             val startY = centerY + 50f * sin(rayAngle).toFloat()
-             val endX = centerX + rayLength * cos(rayAngle).toFloat()
-             val endY = centerY + rayLength * sin(rayAngle).toFloat()
-             
-             val rayAlpha = (0.1f + 0.2f * sin(gradientAnimation * PI.toFloat() * 3f + index).toFloat()).coerceIn(0f, 0.3f)
-             
-             drawLine(
+                             start = Offset(projected.x, projected.y),
+                             end = Offset(
+                                 projected.x + cos(angle) * size * 3f,
+                                 projected.y + sin(angle) * size * 3f
+                             ),
+                             strokeWidth = 1f
+                         )
+                     }
+                 }
+                 
+                 ParticleType.ENERGY -> {
+                     // Orbe de energia
+                     drawCircle(
+                         brush = Brush.radialGradient(
+                             colors = listOf(
+                                 particle.color.copy(alpha = alpha),
+                                 particle.color.copy(alpha = alpha * 0.5f),

+                         lineTo(projected.x + size, projected.y)
+                         lineTo(projected.x, projected.y + size)
+                         close()
+                     }
+                     
+                     drawPath(
+                         path = path,
                          brush = Brush.linearGradient(
                              colors = listOf(
-                         Color(0xFF6200EE).copy(alpha = rayAlpha),

-                     )

-                 start = Offset(startX, startY),
-                 end = Offset(endX, endY),
-                 strokeWidth = 1f,
-                 cap = StrokeCap.Round
-             )
-         }
-     }

+ // Efeitos de p√≥s-processamento
+ fun DrawScope.renderPostProcessingEffects(
+     size: Size,
+     progress: Float,
+     hologramGlow: Float,
+     spaceDistortion: Float
+ ) {
+     // Scanlines hologr√°ficas
+     val scanlineCount = 100
+     val scanlineAlpha = 0.1f * hologramGlow
+     
+     for (i in 0 until scanlineCount) {
+         val y = (i.toFloat() / scanlineCount) * size.height
+         val offset = sin(y * 0.01f + spaceDistortion * PI.toFloat() * 2f) * 10f
+         
+         drawLine(
+             color = Color(0xFF00FFFF).copy(alpha = scanlineAlpha),
+             start = Offset(0f + offset, y),
+             end = Offset(size.width + offset, y),
+             strokeWidth = 1f
+         )
+     }
+     
+     // Aberra√ß√£o crom√°tica nas bordas
+     val vignetteStrength = 0.3f * progress
+     drawRect(
+         brush = Brush.radialGradient(
+             colors = listOf(
+                 Color.Transparent,
+                 Color.Black.copy(alpha = vignetteStrength)
+             ),
+             center = Offset(size.width * 0.5f, size.height * 0.5f),
+             radius = size.minDimension * 0.8f
+         )
+     )
+     
+     // Glitch effect
+     if (Random.nextFloat() < 0.05f * progress) {
+         val glitchY = Random.nextFloat() * size.height
+         val glitchHeight = Random.nextFloat() * 50f + 10f
+         
+         drawRect(
+             brush = Brush.horizontalGradient(
+                 colors = listOf(
+                     Color(0xFFFF0080).copy(alpha = 0.3f),
+                     Color(0xFF00FFFF).copy(alpha = 0.3f),
+                     Color(0xFFFF0080).copy(alpha = 0.3f)
+                 )
+             ),
+             topLeft = Offset(0f, glitchY),
+             size = Size(size.width, glitchHeight)
+         )
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ // Proje√ß√£o 3D para 2D
+ data class Point3D(val x: Float, val y: Float, val z: Float)
+ 
+ fun project3DPoint(
+     x: Float,
+     y: Float,
+     z: Float,
+     camera: Camera3D,
+     screenCenter: Offset,
+     fov: Float
+ ): Point3D {
+     // Aplicar rota√ß√£o da c√¢mera
+     val cosY = cos(camera.rotationY * PI / 180f).toFloat()
+     val sinY = sin(camera.rotationY * PI / 180f).toFloat()
+     val cosX = cos(camera.rotationX * PI / 180f).toFloat()
+     val sinX = sin(camera.rotationX * PI / 180f).toFloat()
+     
+     // Rota√ß√£o Y
+     var x1 = x * cosY - z * sinY
+     val z1 = x * sinY + z * cosY
+     
+     // Rota√ß√£o X
+     val y1 = y * cosX - z1 * sinX
+     val z2 = y * sinX + z1 * cosX
+     
+     // Transla√ß√£o da c√¢mera
+     x1 -= camera.x
+     val y2 = y1 - camera.y
+     val z3 = z2 - camera.z
+     
+     // Proje√ß√£o perspectiva
+     if (z3 <= 0) return Point3D(screenCenter.x, screenCenter.y, -1f)
+     
+     val scale = (screenCenter.x * 2f) / (tan(fov * PI / 360f).toFloat() * 2f)
+     val projectedX = (x1 / z3) * scale + screenCenter.x
+     val projectedY = (y2 / z3) * scale + screenCenter.y
+     
+     return Point3D(projectedX, projectedY, z3)
  }

+ @Composable
+ fun CinematicHUD(
+     progress: Float,
+     phase: String,
+     modifier: Modifier = Modifier
+ ) {
+     Box(
+         modifier = modifier
+             .fillMaxWidth()

+             modifier = Modifier
+                 .fillMaxWidth()

+         ) {
+             // HUD futurista
+             val cornerSize = 20f
+             val strokeWidth = 2f
+             
+             // Cantos do HUD
+             // Canto superior esquerdo
+             drawLine(
+                 color = Color(0xFF00E5FF).copy(alpha = 0.8f),
+                 start = Offset(0f, cornerSize),
+                 end = Offset(0f, 0f),
+                 strokeWidth = strokeWidth
+             )
+             drawLine(
+                 color = Color(0xFF00E5FF).copy(alpha = 0.8f),
+                 start = Offset(0f, 0f),
+                 end = Offset(cornerSize, 0f),
+                 strokeWidth = strokeWidth
+             )
+             
+             // Canto superior direito
+             drawLine(
+                 color = Color(0xFF00E5FF).copy(alpha = 0.8f),
+                 start = Offset(size.width - cornerSize, 0f),
+                 end = Offset(size.width, 0f),
+                 strokeWidth = strokeWidth
+             )
+             drawLine(
+                 color = Color(0xFF00E5FF).copy(alpha = 0.8f),
+                 start = Offset(size.width, 0f),
+                 end = Offset(size.width, cornerSize),
+                 strokeWidth = strokeWidth
+             )
+             
+             // Linha de progresso superior
+             drawLine(
+                 color = Color(0xFF00E5FF).copy(alpha = 0.3f),
+                 start = Offset(cornerSize + 10f, 0f),
+                 end = Offset(size.width - cornerSize - 10f, 0f),
+                 strokeWidth = 1f
+             )
+             
+             val progressLineEnd = cornerSize + 10f + (size.width - (cornerSize + 10f) * 2) * progress
+             drawLine(
+                 color = Color(0xFF00E5FF),
+                 start = Offset(cornerSize + 10f, 0f),
+                 end = Offset(progressLineEnd, 0f),
+                 strokeWidth = 2f
+             )
+         }
+         
+         // Informa√ß√µes do HUD
+         Row(
+             modifier = Modifier
+                 .fillMaxWidth()
+                 .padding(top = 8.dp, start = 30.dp, end = 30.dp),
+             horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.SpaceBetween
